about.p2: I am MCStatus. A Discord Bot by [LamboCreeper](http://lambocreeper.uk/) that allows you to check the status of your favourite Minecraft related services.

server.name: **Server Information**
server.description: Get information about a specific Minecraft server.

official.name: **Official Minecraft Services**
official.description: Get information about official Minecraft services ran by Mojang.

server.not_defined: You must define a server IP that you would like to get the status of.
server.unknown: The API failed to ping this server. Are you sure the IP is correct?
